title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Pilatus PC 6 passenger version - using the autopilot
description:
In this how to we are going to look how to use the autopilot in a Pilatus PC 6 which has been added to MSFS 2020 as part of Sim Update VII. We will look at all functions and use most of them during this video.
